page.title: 01General View.
page.content: General View of Block. The block in question is mostly covered by the River Neath tidal marsh.As a result it is far too dangerous an area to study with children.However,the area is surrounded by hills,at the base of which is a continous urban sprawl.This urban area consists of the town of Neath and the villages of Skewen and Briton Ferry. Most of the work in this project will be based on this urban area and was completed by schools situated here.The schools are Alderman Davies Junior School,Coedffranc Junior School,Melin Junior School and Ynysmaerdy Junior School. The work in general looks at the way in which people have affected the area in the past and the present.
